org.crsh.standalone
Class Bootstrap

java.lang.Object
  org.crsh.plugin.PluginLifeCycle
      org.crsh.standalone.Bootstrap

public class Bootstrap
extends PluginLifeCycle

A boostrap for starting a standalone CRaSH.
